backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing installCount with query getter and shared increment method.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing hero rendering bugs, fallback requirements, and affected files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose of each frontend landing-page file.
frontend/docs/landing-customization.md: Guide explaining how to customize APK link, install counter, landing structure, copy, and visual effects.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH variables, dark mode tokens, and base layout.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry wrapping LandingPage with React Query and dark-only ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/landing/download: Centralized APK download link and handler opening Expo artifact in new tab.
frontend/src/components/landing/effects/: Mouseâ€‘tracking glow effect that disables on touch devices.
frontend/src/components/landing/GlassPan: Reusable glassmorphism wrapper component with optional strong variant.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Fau: Styles for hero WebGL background with fallback gradient when WebGL fails.
WebGL shader-based terminal effect component with mouse/reactive and glitch parameters.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Flo: Empty or truncated file; content not provided.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Her: Canvas-based animated particle background with resize handling and subtle gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/landing/Installs: Displays install count from backend via useInstallCount at top of page.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Central config for landing page CTAs and APK download URL pulled from download module.
Static text content and section IDs for all landing page sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Main landing layout composing all sections plus cursor glow and install bar.
frontend/src/components/landing/Responsi: Utility container providing consistent responsive padding and width.
Generic section wrapper adding scroll reveal animations via useScrollReveal.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Section rendering large ASCII-styled 'KARM' text using the AsciiText component.
Centered section displaying the cult-line headline and subtext from landing copy.
Final CTA section with download button triggering APK download and install count increment, plus footer.
Hero section with animated terminal background, wordmark, tagline, and download/scroll CTAs.
Scroll-triggered sequential text reveal section using IntersectionObserver.
Simple social proof text section populated from landing copy.
Three-column feature description section sourced from landing copy.
frontend/src/components/landing/three/As: Three.js-based ASCII rendering system with custom shaders and mouse-reactive ASCII filter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching backend actor instances tied to identity changes with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallCount.ts: Hook managing install count fetch and optimistic increment via actor methods and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a scroll-based parallax effect hook that returns a vertical offset based on element position.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file; all landing page data is static elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver-based hook that marks an element visible once it enters the viewport.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables, dark mode tokens, utility classes, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing a white screen in the hero section.
